title: No, These Photos Aren’t Eid Clashes in Kashmir – They’re From 2016
subtitle: Though clashes and stone-pelting did take place in Srinagar on 5 June after Eid prayers, the images being shared in the viral message are old and that of unrelated incidents.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim: These images are being circulated on social media with the message: “श्रीनगर में नमाज के बाद सेना पर पत्थर बाजी जारी,क्या इनको देखते ही ठोक देना चाइये”
